tool_description: High resolution retina tiles for your interactive online map.
title: Retina Tiles

api_list.name: RetinaTile
api_list.description: Get a 512px times 512px retina tile. Please see the [about page](https://rapidapi.com/MapTilesApi/api/retina-tiles/details) or  the [tutorials](https://rapidapi.com/MapTilesApi/api/retina-tiles/tutorials) on how to use this Endpoint (yep, the generic RapidAPI code examples here are not helpful for maps).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://retina-tiles.p.rapidapi.com/local/osm@2x/v1/{z}/{x}/{y}.png"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "retina-tiles.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: StandardTile
api_list.description: Get a standard 256px times 256px raster tile. Please see the [about page](https://rapidapi.com/MapTilesApi/api/retina-tiles/details) or the [tutorials](https://rapidapi.com/MapTilesApi/api/retina-tiles/tutorials) on how to use this Endpoint (yep, the generic RapidAPI code examples here are not helpful for maps).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://retina-tiles.p.rapidapi.com/local/osm/v1/{z}/{x}/{y}.png"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "retina-tiles.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
